popPlanets.name: Venus
popPlanets.description: This dim world of intense heat and volcanic activity is Earth gone awry.

popPlanets.name: Mars
popPlanets.description: Mars may have once been a wet world like Earth. Where did the water go?

popMissions.name: New Horizons
popMissions.description: New Horizons is the first mission to explore Pluto and the Kuiper Belt.

people.name: Carol Raymond
people.title: Deputy Principal Investigator
people.quote: We are on the verge of an explosion of knowledge of what makes up the other bodies of our solar system.

people.name: Jeff Taylor
people.title: cosmochemist
people.quote: Learn how to communicate effectively in both writing and speaking.This is essential so you can tell other scientists what you have discovered and let the public know how you are spending their tax dollars.

people.name: Tanya Harrison
people.title: Planetary Scientist
people.quote: It was almost surreal -- not only are you picking what to take pictures of on Mars, you're also typically the first person on Earth to see those pictures when they come back from Mars.
